nodes.text: The Cularin Pirates were a pirate group that operated in the Cularin system during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

The Human Dorel-Kan became a high-ranking member of the Cularin Pirates, and he developed a close working relationship with his fellow pirate Reeayah, a Twi'lek Force Adept. During the Confederation Rock Rush, the Cularin Pirates and their starship were present in the Cularin system asteroid belt, and Reeayah used the dark side of the Force to allow them to track the Neeva-Beelo, which the pirates viewed as a potential target. The Beelo docked inside an asteroid, so Dorel-Kan, Reeayah and ten other pirates landed on the rock and attacked the Beelo's crew, the Heroes of Cularin.
